name: Mephisto
desc: More accurately, Mephistopheles. He is one of the princes of Hell and his name means "he who loves not the light". He is commonly known as the demon summoned by Georg Faust. Other than Satan himself, he is the most feared commander in Hell. However, he despises having fallen into Hell and hates any and all humans who have been granted salvation. He is rather knowledgeable in the realms of astronomy, astrology and meteorology in addition to being a skilled illusionist who can manipulate all five senses.
